summary: The diff successfully implements all requested requirements. The backend adds both ASIN and productName fields to the Product type, updates mock products with valid 10-character ASINs, and ensures these fields are returned in responses. The frontend updates the Product type definition, displays the ASIN prominently with monospace styling on ProductCard, and ensures the product name is the primary heading. Migration logic is included to handle the schema change.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for data schema migration from old Product type to new Product type
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention creating a migration module or handling backward compatibility for existing products. This is additional infrastructure not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration import and actor stabilization pattern in backend/main.mo
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff includes 'import Migration "migration";' and '(with migration = Migration.run)' pattern which was not requested in the BuildRequest. This is additional backend architecture not specified.
